entry.title: Two Pack Room Darkening Window Curtain Panels, Space -X-VI, Heat & Full Light Blocking Rod Pocket Drapes W/Liner for Bedroom & Nursery (2 Panels - 52 in Wide x 84 in Long)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cipcici
Type: Shower Curtains
Price: 99.99

  • BRIGHT & BEAUTIFUL- Unique designs with bright colors that brighten up a room and bring style to a room. These digitally printed panels have excellent quality.
  • PREMIUM MATERIALS - 100% Polyester which is very resilient and durable. With both back tab and rod pocket this allowed to different ways to hang the curtain.
  • TURKISH - These premium room darkening curtains are made in Turkey.
  • ROOM DARKENING - These curtains are 80% light reduction curtains. Blocks light and UV rays as well as helping maintain privacy. The curtain will also reduce unwanted sound and noise from the outside.
  • COOLER & WARMER - These energy efficient curtains will help reduce the heat in the summer keeping rooms cooler and keep heat in during the winter leaving rooms warmer.
